title: Rare Find!! 1 Bedroom Includes A Washer & Dryer Inside Your Home!!
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'This is a 1 Bedroom + 1 Den, 1 Bath, approximately 916 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Settle in Style!', 'Your Home Your Canvas.', 'Featuring a new expanded fitness center, business center w/ WiFi lounge, redesigned clubroom and beautifully refinished homes!', 'Apartment Living : Evolved.', "At the hub of everything haute and hip in Southeast Denver you'll find Legend Oaks Apartments, where an evolution in apartment living is emerging.", "Here you can walk to Havana Street's fun and funky shopping, eateries and events.", "Bike to Cherry Creek's abundant recreation and parks, or spend the day there boutique-browsing and gallery-hopping.", "This prime location offers easy access to I-225 and is minutes from downtown, Denver Tech Center, Children's Hospital Colorado and DIA.", "Then come home to Legend Oaks' evolving collection of 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments, completely redesigned to complement today's lifestyle.", "Here you'll find beautifully refinished homes: All-new kitchens with new cabinets, countertops and clean steel appliances.", 'Nine-foot ceilings with crown molding, chic updated lighting, fresh wall colors and a cozy gas fireplace.', 'And of course, your must-have conveniences such as a full-size washer/dryer, private garage and plentiful storage.', 'Close to I-25, Close to I-225, Cherry Creek Schools, Cherry Creek Challenge School, RTD 83L, RTD 11, RTD 120, RTD light rail, Close to light rail, Gardens on Havana, Close to CU Hospital, Close to Anschutz Medical Campus, Close to Buckley Air Force Base, Close to Cherry Creek, Close to DTC, Cherry Creek Reservoir, Cherry Creek State Park, Highline Canal Trail', 'Features:', 'Open floorplans, Kitchen pantry*, Window coverings, Private patio / balcony with storage, Espresso cabinetry, Full size washer / dryer included, 9 foot ceilings with crown molding, Clean steel & black appliances, Refinished bathrooms with large oval tubs*, Central heat and AC, Cozy gas fireplaces*, Remodeled interiors, Chic lighting & wall colors, Large walk-in closets, Built-in shelving*, Bedroom access to patio*, Twin basin vanities*', '*Select Apartment Homes', 'Community Amenities:', 'Gated entry after hours, Private detached garages available, Picnic gazebo & BBQ area, Year-round resort style pool, Newly remodeled fitness center, Electronic payments accepted, Relaxing spa, Mature landscaping, Cherry Creek School District, Newly remodeled business center with free wi-fi, Off-leash dog park, Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet friendly!', 'Call for breed restrictions!', 'Income Requirements:', '2.5', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'M5QkPRj5']
